name: Password store
description: Copy your passwords from password store

preferences.name: Run custom command
preferences.description: Run custom command before and after copying password. Ex: Put clipboard manager into offline (unmonitoring) mode. (Tip: Use full binary path)

preferences.name: Delay time before executing second command (by seconds)
preferences.description: Sometimes, executing two commands one ofter the other causes problems. Increase delay time to solve this

preferences.name: Enable tail command
preferences.description:
Trigger the tail command by adding "tail" to any query.
Note: Requires pass-extension-tail extension. (https://git.io/vpSgV)
